answerText: An Equal Music[10] In this lengthy novel by the same author, Rupa Mehra tries to find a husband for her daughter, Lata.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 11 | 14 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This novel is dedicated to the author's friend, Phillippe Honore. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which Michael Holme rekindles his old romance with Julia McNicholl after seeing her in London. However, she finally reveals that she is married and has a child.
